article_title: Proposed SGR deal would advance GOP goal of restructuring Medicare - Modern Healthcare Vital Signs

article_metadata.description: The proposed bipartisan House deal to repeal and replace Medicare's hated sustainable growth-rate physician payment system offers Republicans a chance to make two significant benefit changes they've long sought. Now it remains to be seen if they can accept and lock in that victory.
article_metadata.title: Proposed SGR deal would advance GOP goal of restructuring Medicare
